History
-------

0.2.1 (2013-12-18)

  users.

++++++++++++++++++

* Refactored code and fixed a memory leak when throwing an exception.

++++++++++++++++++

* Added MANIFEST.in

0.1.0 (2013-10-02)

* Initial release
